column5: i was thinking about getting a portable ice kit for my 597ci hd di and was wondering if anybody bought one of these kits?  what does it come with?  from what i can tell you need the kit... as well as a power cord and a ice-ducer...  on amazon you can get all this for 160 bucks... then my 597 will be a year round set up...  im talking about the KIT here... not just a soft pack...  from what i can tell the kit comes with a soft pack...battery...charrger...and mount for head unit..    also... right now i have a vexilar fl-8 ultra pack...  is it worth selling my vexilar to make the switch...  im thinking about doing this so i can have sonar and gps on the ice as well as more features on my humminbird unit compared to my vex...     thanks for any help everyone   mike

The portable ice pack doesn't come with a transducer..  Only the pack itself, the battery and the charger.  Transducer you'll need depending on your unit.  http://store.humminbird.com/products/314001/XI_9_20  The pack you'll need.  http://store.humminbird.com/products/322965/PTC_U  I have both of these and ran my 747c last year out on Simcoe, this year I'll be running the same pack/transducer with my 788ci.

heres the amazon link...  http://www.amazon.com/Humminbird-4069001-Portable-Case-Conversion/dp/B000N2ZZ2I/ref=pd_sim_e_2  the pack is on sale now...  does the conversion pack come with a power line bill?
The Pack comes with everything to hook up your graph up, except the transducer and transducer wire.  (All wires to the battery, mount,  charger, etc etc)
i just got the ice transducer at West Marine for $87, good price for the convenience.
